description.ko: 단단한 모놀리스가 디지털 카오스와 스캔라인 파편으로 부서지는 기하학적 붕괴에 대한 극명한 탐구입니다.
description.en: A stark exploration of geometric disintegration, where a solid monolith breaks into digital chaos and scanline fragments.

prompt: A massive, brutalist obsidian #1A1A1A monument suspended in a stark #FFFFFF void, mid-collapse and fracturing into a recursive torrent of sharp #808080 geometric shards and vertical #C0C0C0 scanline glitches. The composition features high-contrast monochrome complexity with deep digital noise textures and raytraced reflections on the fragmented black glass surfaces. 8k resolution, Octane Render. Razor-sharp shadows emphasize the chaos within order, capturing the perfect balance of a disintegrating digital reality.
